column4: I'm trying to install ubuntu 12.04 but firstly I have to deal with partitions. I've got some troubles with "try me without installing". Everything seems to work until I choose that option. After that, I get just desktop and cursor.
No errors in tty, and tty is working.
What could be wrong?
that is suppose to happen
your trying ubuntu without installing it
and... what are you trying to say? :)
if you want to install ubuntu onto your system then you need to select the install option
hey, I want gparted firstly! :D
you need to install ubuntu
then install gparted
no, I'm pretty sure I don't _need_ to install it firstly. Gparted is included in the live session.
I have troubless with starting ubuntu live sessions.
ok so what issue are you having?
live session wount start. I'm stuck with background and pointer.
there may be an issue with your video driver
do you have a nvidia card?
no, it's a radeon card.
i don't think that it's a kms related problem. (nomodeset and stuff)
hmmm idk if ati has open source drivers
people usually have issues with nvidia because their drivers are not open source so they are not included in linux distros
it has, the radeon dirvers. Proprietary are fglrx. But... I think that t's something other.
erm, nvidia has open source drivers, too. Nouveau...
